snippet.title: New best Drifting game 2023 | Drift Cuty Underground | Racing, Driving PC Game
snippet.description:
Drift City is an Open World Driving Drifting Sim with Deep Car Customization such as Speed, Suspension, different driving system and styles and much more which you can read down below. There are 8 cars that can be unlocked for the Early Access and we will add at least 20 cars to the game. It has 6 different cameras/views to see the car and play. There are also Slowmotion and Nitro for all cars available. It has a minimap so you can see where you go and what you will face and amazing music that can be muted if you wish. More in detail down below. Coming Soon on Steam!

https://gamejolt.com/games/Drift-City/764700
Song: Cosmic Drift - Divkid
#sports #racing #drift #cars #openworld #sim #driving #cars
